      public Meeting()

    • Meeting

      public Meeting(int month, int day)
      Constructor that can be used to block off a whole day - such as for a vacation
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12).
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31).

    • Meeting

      public Meeting(int month, int day, String description)
      Constructor that can be used to block off a whole day - such as for a vacation
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12).
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31).
      description - - A description of the meeting.

    • Meeting

      public Meeting(int month, int day, int start, int end)
      More detailed constructor
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12).
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31).
      start - - The time the meeting starts (0-23).
      end - - The time the meeting ends (0-23).

    • Meeting

      public Meeting(int month, int day, int start, int end, ArrayList<Person> attendees, Room room, String description)
      More detailed constructor
      Parameters:
      month - - The month of the meeting (1-12).
      day - - The day of the meeting (1-31).
      start - - The time the meeting starts (0-23).
      end - - The time the meeting ends (0-23).
      attendees - - The people attending the meeting.
      room - - The room that the meeting is taking place in.
      description - - A description of the meeting.
